item.title: veachron
item.author: Oliver Vea
item.description: Overview Veachron is an application which can help storing and displaying timings. The main use-case is for debugging, as it can be embedded into code and used to get actual timings. The project is freely available on Github. The project consists of a Python application, using the Flask framework to host a REST API. The API is documented through swagger, to ensure ease of use. The application can be hosted directly, but alternatively, two Docker images are provided, with the application and a PostgreSQL database, for storing the timer logs.
